Title: Bayern brush aside off-field woe thrash Dortmund ` Klassiker '
Text: Managerless Bayern Munich thrash Borussia Dortmund 4-0 ` Der Klassiker ' Robert Lewandowski continue phenomenal score run two goal Allianz Arena Lewandowski ' first-half header 76th-minute tap-in mean score Bayern ' Bundesliga Champions League game season tally 23 goal Serge Gnabry claim Bayern ' second visit captain Mats Hummels score late goal former club dortmund suffer another heavy defeat Munich also lose 5-0 April Bayern ' move third level point second-placed rb Leipzig one behind leader borussia moenchengladbach host Werder Bremen Sunday Interim coach Hansi flick enjoy second win charge since Niko Kovac sack last Sunday however Bayern difficulty find new coach Arsene Wenger Saturday contradict claim turn Kovac ' successor slam club lack discretion Bayern chairman Karl-Heinz Rummenigge speak Wenger last week cancel pre-match interview Sky Ajax coach Erik ten Hag Paris Saint-Germain boss Thomas Tuchel already make clear not join Bayern season despite off-field trouble Bayern bounce back last weekend ' 5-1 drubbing Eintracht Frankfurt Lewandowski score superb header Benjamin Pavard cross 17 minute Dortmund winger Jadon Sancho hook 36 minute fail make impact proceedings Gnabry goal rule offside Bayern go 1-0 break Germany winger strike two minute second half Lewandowski stumble goal mercy gnabry fire home hour go side 2-0 dortmund coach Lucien Favre bring forwards Marco Reus Paco Alcacer recover foot calf injury respectively Alcacer head hand fail connect Achraf Hakimi cross 20 minute leave Dortmund ' best chance go beg Bayern ' third come Lewandowski finish another counter-attack host hummel ' goal Leipzig go second earlier Timo Werner net twice Leipzig go second 4-2 win Hertha Berlin capital Berlin Wall fall November 9 1989 mark 30th anniversary replica wall divide Germany ' capital 1961 separated Hertha Leipzig knock prior kick-off Midfielder Maximilian Mittelstaedt give Hertha first-half lead last six minute Werner convert penalty hat-trick last weekend ' 8-0 thrashing Mainz Marcel Sabitzer add Leipzig ' second stroke half-time three goal come final five minute Kevin Kampl net Leipzig ' third superb left-footed strike Werner grab second 11th league goal many game Hertha striker Davie Selke score former club striker Rouwen Hennings complete hat-trick five minute time Fortuna Duesseldorf hold Schalke 3-3 draw Royal Blues squander lead three time goal Daniel Caligiuri Ozan Kabak Suat Serdar Gelsenkirchen cancel Hennings Union Berlin 11th third straight win Sebastian Anderson score twice 3-2 victory Mainz Augsburg climb bottom three 1-0 win bottom club paderborn
